title: when your team8 tell you you're bad, but you have a better KDA then they have
body: happens to me all the time

replies.body: KDA isn't all that matters bro.  It doesn't define whether you're good or not.  You need good map awareness, mechanics, and such.  Having a good KDA doesn't mean you're a good player :\  Sorry, just saying what comes to mind

M8 i know, iam just saying thatthis happens to me often.And a few days ago i won my lane but all my team8's lost their and gave all their fault on me even though i helped them throuhout thw whole game.
you know, I'm not sure if you would understand why you wrong even if I expalined it to you, so just understand that winning lane isn't enough to be guilt free.
Rengar top v teemo 10/3 at end of laning phase 'Stop feeding Teemo, rengar' ~the 0/6 Jinx 2k16
